name: Destruction or disposition of property having insubstantial commercial value; immunity from liability
text: If the director determines after investigation that any property delivered under this part has insubstantial commercial value, the director may destroy or otherwise dispose of the property at any time.  No action or proceeding may be maintained against this State or any officer or against the holder for or on account of any action taken by the director pursuant to this section. [L 1983, c 37, pt of §2]
